decision_conditions: <p>The unauthorised roof overhang as shown on existing elevation and floorplan (ref 139HV-O/06092023/REV-B-1/2; 139HV-O/06092023/REV-B-2/2) shall be removed within three months of the date of this planning permission.</p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="">The development hereby permitted
shall be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse
(139 Harrow View, Harrow, HA1 4SX) and shall not be used as a separate unit
of residential accommodation, without the prior permission in writing of the
Local Planning Authority.</p>

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

<p><span style="font-family:&quot;PT Sans&quot;,sans-serif">Notwithstanding the unauthorised roof overhang (subject to condition 5) the development hereby permitted shall be retained in perpetuity in accordance with the approved plans.</span></p>

The development hereby permitted shall be retained&nbsp;in perpetuity&nbsp;in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:&nbsp;<span arial="">139HV-O/06092023/REV-B-1/2; 139HV-O/06092023/REV-B-2/2; Reasonable Exception Statement</span>
description:
Detached outbuilding at rear for use as office/gym (retrospective); removal of
roof overhang to the side and rear of existing outbuilding
